TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed HttpRuntime extends System.Object

summary.span: 為目前應用程式提供一組 ASP.NET Run-Time 服務。

span.span: Provides a set of ASP.NET run-time services for the current application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 物件可用處理 HTTP 要求的 ASP.NET 管線模型的開頭。The object is used at the beginning of the ASP.NET pipeline model that processes HTTP requests. 方法磁碟機處理所有後續的 ASP.NET 網頁。The method drives all subsequent ASP.NET Web processing. 網頁開發人員可以使用類別屬性，以找出目前的應用程式定義域有關的資訊為方便診斷，例如。Page developers can use the class properties to find out information about the current application domain for diagnostic purposes, for example. 開發人員建立自訂的處理程序管線或自訂的裝載環境應該呼叫中方法的類別衍生自或類別。Developers creating custom process pipeline or a custom hosting environment should call the method from a class derived from the or class. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何取得屬性的類別代表目前的應用程式定義域，並顯示給瀏覽器。The following example demonstrates how to get properties of the class representing the current application domain and display them to the browser. [!code-aspx-csharp[SystemWebHttpRuntime#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/SystemWebHttpRuntime/CS/systemwebhttpruntime.cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[SystemWebHttpRuntime#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/SystemWebHttpRuntime/VB/systemwebhttpruntime.vb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property AppDomainAppId As String
public: static property System::String ^ AppDomainAppId { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得 存在的應用程式定義域的應用程式識別。

span.span: Gets the application identification of the application domain where the exists.

value.span: 存在的應用程式定義域的應用程式識別。

span.span: The application identification of the application domain where the exists.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `AppDomainAppID` 可唯一識別應用程式。`AppDomainAppID` uniquely identifies the application. 它不會變更之後重新啟動應用程式，以及建立新的應用程式定義域。It does not change after the application is restarted and a new application domain is created.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property AppDomainAppPath As String
public: static property System::String ^ AppDomainAppPath { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得目前應用程式定義域裡裝載 (Host) 應用程式的應用程式目錄的實體磁碟路徑。

span.span: Gets the physical drive path of the application directory for the application hosted in the current application domain.

value.span: 目前應用程式定義域裡裝載應用程式的應用程式目錄的實體磁碟路徑。

span.span: The physical drive path of the application directory for the application hosted in the current application domain.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property AppDomainAppVirtualPath As String
public: static property System::String ^ AppDomainAppVirtualPath { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得包含目前應用程式定義域裡裝載應用程式的目錄的虛擬路徑。

span.span: Gets the virtual path of the directory that contains the application hosted in the current application domain.

value.span: 包含目前應用程式定義域裡裝載應用程式的目錄的虛擬路徑。

span.span: The virtual path of the directory that contains the application hosted in the current application domain.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property AppDomainId As String
public: static property System::String ^ AppDomainId { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得 執行個體所在之應用程式定義域的定義域識別。

span.span: Gets the domain identification of the application domain where the instance exists.

value.span: 唯一的應用程式定義域識別項。

span.span: The unique application domain identifier.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `AppDomainID` 每當應用程式重新啟動，並建立新的應用程式定義域會改變。`AppDomainID` changes whenever the application is restarted and a new application domain is created.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig void Close() cil managed

summary.span: 關閉 執行個體。

span.span: Shuts down the instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會提供用於，當您的程式碼實作自己的主控環境。This method is provided for use when your code implements its own hosting environment. 沒有需要呼叫這個方法一般要求處理期間。There is no need to call this method in the course of normal request processing.

remarks.format: ## Remarks .NET Framework 3.5 版中引進。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[版本和相依性](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會提供用於，當您的程式碼實作自己的主控環境。This method is provided for use when your code implements its own hosting environment. 它也可用來執行子要求，當您的程式碼實作自己。It also can be used to execute child requests when your code implements its own .

span.span: The parameter is .

exception.span: Web 應用程式正在 IIS 7 下的整合模式中執行。

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property TargetFramework As Version
public: static property Version ^ TargetFramework { Version ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得目前 Web 應用程式以之為設計目標的 .NET Framework 版本。

span.span: Gets the version of the .NET Framework that the current web application targets.

value.span: 目前 Web 應用程式以之為設計目標的 .NET Framework 版本。

span.span: The version of the .NET Framework that the current web application targets.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性通常會設定使用`targetFramework`屬性`httpRuntime`Web.config 檔案中的項目。This property is normally set by using the `targetFramework` attribute of the `httpRuntime` element in the Web.config file. 此屬性並非傳回正確的值，如果 currentapplication 網域不是 ASP.NET 應用程式定義域。This property is not guaranteed to return a correct value if the currentapplication domain is not an ASP.NET application domain.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig void UnloadAppDomain() cil managed

summary.span: 終止目前的應用程式。

span.span: Terminates the current application.

summary.span: 下次收到應用程式的要求時，就會重新啟動。

span.span: The application restarts the next time a request is received for it.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `UnloadAppDomain` 適用於具有大量不常接收要求的應用程式的伺服器。`UnloadAppDomain` is useful for servers that have a large number of applications that infrequently receive requests. 而不是保持應用程式資源存活的處理程序的存留期`UnloadAppDomain`允許以程式設計方式關閉未使用的應用程式。Rather than keep application resources alive for the lifetime of the process, `UnloadAppDomain` allows programmatic shutdown of unused applications.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property UsingIntegratedPipeline As Boolean
public: static property bool UsingIntegratedPipeline { bool get(); };

summary.span: 取得值，這個值指示目前的應用程式是否正以 [!INCLUDE[iisver](~/includes/iisver-md.md)] Integrated 管線模式執行。

value.span: 如果應用程式正以 Integrated 管線模式執行，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the application is running in integrated-pipeline mode; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 整合式管線模式不是在 IIS 的版本比可用[!INCLUDE[iisver](~/includes/iisver-md.md)]。Integrated-pipeline mode is not available in versions of IIS earlier than [!INCLUDE[iisver](~/includes/iisver-md.md)].
